name: Lake: Season's Greetings
summary: It's Christmas time, 1985. Thomas Weiss spends the final few days of the year as he's always been doing: delivering mail and celebrating Christmas with his friends and family in Providence Oaks. However, this holiday season turns out a quite a bit different than expected...
